review:
Been showing him for ten years now, whenever there is any orthopedic issue. 
Almost all the time, I recovered under his guidance without much pain killers or unnecessary medicines.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: The doctor was very kind enough to explain me about my situation and the precautions which had to be taken. Explained it very clearly

the doctor was first late by 1 hour then again another hour.looks like the doctor doesn't value consumer's time.atleast they could have informed me beforehand.they informed me very very late.not recommended
